column4: hi im having some trouble mounting a floppy, when I try mount /dev/fd/0 i get mount: /dev/pts/1 is not a block device
mount dev/fd0 gives mount: /dev/fd0 is not a valid block device.  Can i add it to block devices
fd is listed as a block device in /proc/devices but 'mount /dev/fd someDir' gives mount: /proc/5618/fd is not a block device
